title: Readout of the President’s Call with NASA Astronauts | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
March 24, 2009

 



Readout of the President’s Call with NASA Astronauts




President Calls NASA Astronauts
On March 24, 2009, the President made a long distance call to the International Space Station. President Obama was joined by Congressional leaders and middle school students from the Washington, DC area in the Roosevelt Room to congratulate the astronauts on the International Space Station and the Space Shuttle Discovery on their successful ongoing mission. They spent some time talking about solar power from a very different perspective. Read more...
